cause.description:
Charlie Company 163rd Support Battalion from Darlington, South Carolina, propose to establish a Kabul community service project to educate, assist, and provide medical support in hope of increasing basic medical knowledge and techniques amongst Local Nationals. The effort is called The Educating Afghans to Suppress Terrorism (EAST) Project, and will represent the work of Medics, Preventive Medicine Specialist, and other volunteers from all areas of our armed forces.
1. To Educate
2. To Assist
3. To Give
cause.mission: To mentally and physically heal Afghans with education and assistance to prevent further illness so that they can educate generations to come.
cause.name: The E.A.S.T. Project
